name: All Of This For A Burger
name_original: All Of This For A Burger
description:
All of This For a Burger is game about a fat man who goes on an epic quest to recover a stolen cheeseburger instead of just ordering another one. The game features a STUNNING cast of characters, INCREDIBLE gameplay, and absolutely no bugs whatsoever, as I am clearly a professional game developer, and I don't make mitsakes. There's an online mode, where you are randomly split into two teams, and the goal is to destroy the other team's burger. No friends? No problem! There's a single player mode, too. 

Discord Server: https://discord.gg/Uf3dp7WeEG

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8gvBz0XJgmnRlRZzvX7Xww
